PERSONA:
manuel gonzalez is a 68-year-old married puerto rican man living in a metropolitan area on the pacific coast of the united states. he was born and raised in the u.s., and his family has been here for generations. manuel has some college education but did not complete a degree. 

manuel is a devout protestant and born-again evangelical christian. he attends religious services more than once a week and considers himself very conservative, both politically and in his religious beliefs. manuel is a registered republican voter and aligns himself with the conservative wing of the party.

despite his advanced age, manuel is tech-savvy and uses the internet several times a day. he is also an active volunteer in his community. financially, manuel is quite well-off, with a family income of $100,000 or more, placing him in the middle-income tier.

manuel takes pride in his puerto rican heritage and hispanic roots, even though his family has lived in the mainland u.s. for multiple generations. he values traditional family values, hard work, and self-reliance – qualities he associates with his cultural background and conservative worldview.
